main event: An observer reported seeing a bright red object descending like a meteor, trailing a long tail, and lasting 5 to 10 seconds without making any noise.
interesting points: The object was described as bright red in color,The flight path and duration were consistent with a meteor observation,No other reports of similar phenomena were noted in the area at the time,The observer did not report having seen a similar phenomenon before,According to Air Force analysis, the characteristics closely matched those of a meteor.
sighted object: a bright red object with a long tail
witness description: The observer did not have anyone else present at the time of sighting.
